book.synopsis:
The most detailed resource ever released on accessing divine power and divine favor in the D&D world.

Complete Divine provides Dungeons & DragonsÂ® players with an in-depth look at how to gain the favor of the gods and use that power to a character

s character choices, and clerics in particular are provided with many new and updated spell domains and spells.
This title also contains a wealth of material for non-cleric characters, so the tips and data provided will assist all class types, including those classes not typically associated with garnering divine power.
s Guide to Divine Magic for all Classes (Dungeons & Dragons d20 3.5 Fantasy Roleplaying Supplement)
